title: Register ERC20 for Osmosis
desc:
## Author
GV | Swiss Staking ([@swiss_staking](https://twitter.com/swiss_staking))

## ERC20 representation for Osmosis
This proposal creates and registers an ERC20 representation for Osmosis. If proposales passes you can use Osmosis on DeFi protocols, NFT marketplaces and so on within the Evmos ecosystem.

## Before Voting 
Please follow and discuss this proposal using the official [discussion on commonwealth](https://commonwealth.im/evmos/discussion/4969-this-proposal-creates-and-registers-an-erc20-representation-for-osmosis). For an in-depth explanation of the module, please refer to [Github](https://github.com/tharsis/evmos/tree/main/x/erc20/spec).

## Verify Metadata
IBC denomination and naming standard:
* base: ibc/ED07A3391A112B175915CD8FAF43A2DA8E4790EDE12566649D0C2F97716B8518
* display: osmo
* name: Osmosis channel-0
* symbol: ibc-OSMO

**Note:** 
* base: ibc token
* Name: must include channel (enforced by protocol)
* Symbol: must include 'ibc' prefix (enforced by protocol)
* Display: must match denomination unit (osmo)

## Testing on Testnet
With [proposal 29](https://testnet.mintscan.io/evmos-testnet/proposals/29) we registered testnet OSMO on the Evmos testnet as an ERC20.
